page.title: 06FARMING AROUND SOUTHWELL (3)
page.content: Many farmers have small modern{houses, unrecognisable s a farmhouse, right away from the farm itself. Even the old traditional farmhouses are nearly all modernised and up to date with all {modern conveniences,}such as washing machines, dishwashers, deepfreezers, microwave ovens, central heating etc. The modern farmhouse has, in fact, characteristics of an ordinary home. When visiting a farm, I saw in a storehouse a fantastic pile of{grain many feet high. They say that there is a shortage of grain, but with this amount I thought that this was pretty amazing. When I cycled round the farms, I could see that it was bad year for the farmer because the crops were flattened by the strong winds and wet{weather.
